summary: After a workaholic banker journeys to Monaco to investigate the suspicious activities of a company, he finds himself framed for murder and running for his life.
cast: Michael Keaton|Michael Caine|Judith Godrèche|Rade Serbedzija|Matthew Marsh|Xander Berkeley|Kathleen Wilhoite|Rachel Ferjani|Elina Löwensohn|Clare Thomas|Hermione Norris|William Beck|Jean-Yves Berteloot|Jean-Pierre Castaldi|Colin Stinton|Bogdan E. Stanoevitch|Paul O'Boyle|Patrick Mazet|Paul Birchard|Bob Friend|Sabrina Mongin|Axelle Beharry|Stéphane Lévêque|Jake Broder|Serge Soric|Ivan Marevich|Simon Smith|Herve Candy|Aurelie Attyasse|Sebastian Barrio|Pascal Saint-James|Stephan Chrisz|Greg Bronson|Didier Casnati|Anthony Ross
title: Quicksand (Juego sucio)
